title: Heft Jest Plugin Options Configuration
description: This schema describes the "options" field that can be specified in heft.json when loading `@rushstack/heft-jest-plugin`.

configurationPath.title: Path to Jest configuration file
configurationPath.description: If provided, this path will be used to load Jest configuration. Otherwise, Jest configuration will be loaded from "<projectDir>/config/jest.config.json".

disableConfigurationModuleResolution.title: Disable Configuration Module Resolution
disableConfigurationModuleResolution.description: If set to true, modules specified in the Jest configuration will be resolved using Jest default (rootDir-relative) resolution. Otherwise, modules will be resolved using Node module resolution.

enableNodeEnvManagement.title: Enable management of the NODE_ENV variable
enableNodeEnvManagement.description: If set to false, heft-jest-plugin will not set or unset the NODE_ENV variable. Otherwise, NODE_ENV will be set to `test` before execution and cleared after. If the NODE_ENV value is already set to a value that is not `test`, warning message appears.
